member.name: T:Json.Path.ExperimentalFeatures
member.summary: Provides options for experimental features.
member.remarks: Changes to this object will not be reflected in the version number.

member.name: P:Json.Path.ExperimentalFeatures.ProcessDataReferences
member.summary: Enables dereferencing of reference objects such as ```{ "$ref": "http://example.com/data#/pointer/to/value" }```. The resulting value will then replace the reference object in the evaluation results. This will be run after each selector in the path.

member.name: P:Json.Path.ExperimentalFeatures.DataReferenceDownload
member.summary: Gets or sets the document download mechanism for resolving URIs. This default is a simple, uncached download.

member.name: T:Json.Path.JsonPath
member.summary: Represents a JSON Path.

member.name: M:Json.Path.JsonPath.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a from a string.
member.exception: Thrown if a syntax error occurred.

member.name: M:Json.Path.JsonPath.TryParse(System.String,Json.Path.JsonPath@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse a from a string.

member.name: M:Json.Path.JsonPath.Evaluate(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,Json.Path.PathEvaluationOptions)
member.summary: Evaluates the path against a JSON instance.
member.param: The root of the JSON instance.

member.name: M:Json.Path.JsonPath.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:Json.Path.JsonPathConverter
member.summary: JSON converter for .

member.name: M:Json.Path.JsonPathConverter.Read(System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader@,System.Type,System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Reads and converts the JSON to type .
member.param: An object that specifies serialization options to use.

member.summary: Writes a specified value as JSON.
member.param: The value to convert to JSON.
An object that specifies serialization options to use.

member.name: T:Json.Path.PathEvaluationOptions
member.summary: Provides options for path evaluation.

member.name: P:Json.Path.PathEvaluationOptions.ExperimentalFeatures
member.summary: Provides options for experimental features.
member.remarks: Changes to this object will not be reflected in the version number.

member.name: T:Json.Path.PathMatch
member.summary: Represents a single match.

member.name: P:Json.Path.PathMatch.Value
member.summary: The value at the matching location.

member.name: P:Json.Path.PathMatch.Location
member.summary: The location where the value was found.

member.name: T:Json.Path.PathParseException
member.summary: Thrown when an error occurs attempting to parse a JSON Path.

member.name: P:Json.Path.PathParseException.Index
member.summary: The index at which the error occurred.

member.name: T:Json.Path.PathResult
member.summary: The results of a JSON Path evaluation against a JSON instance.

member.summary: The list of matches.

member.name: P:Json.Path.PathResult.Error
member.summary: An error, if any, that occurred during evaluation.
